preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh out 70 g of phosphorus using a precision scale. 
 2. Weigh out 10 g of silicon. 
 3. In a mixing bowl, combine the phosphorus and silicon thoroughly. 
 4. Add 20 g of binder to the mixture. 
 5. Gradually incorporate 50 g of filler into the mixture, ensuring an even consistency. 
 6. Mix the components until a homogeneous mixture is achieved, ensuring no lumps remain.
